sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都有"相信，信任"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: belief, faith, confidence, conviction, credit, trust
means: belief ： 普通用词，指单纯从主观上的相信，不着重这种相信是否有根据。
faith ： 语气较强，强调完全相信；有时也能仅凭感觉产生的相信。
confidence ： 指对某人某事有充分信心，断定不会使人失望，因而给予信任。
conviction ： 多指根据长期交往或实践，对某人某事有了认识和了解后产生的信心和相信，侧重其坚定性。
credit ： 语气最弱，着重以声誉为信任的基础。
trust ： 强调相信、信任的完全可靠。

sentence.Network_en: The Greeks accepted belief in the immortality of the soul.
Sweden is lovely in summer— cold beyond belief in winter.
sentence.Network_cn: 瑞典的夏天非常宜人——冬天却冷得让人难以置信。

sentence.Network_en: America's belief in its own God-ordained uniqueness started to erode.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国人心中上帝赋予了他们独一无二的品质的信念开始逐渐丧失。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 信念，欺骗(lie)这个字埋藏在信念(belief)，信念系统里我现在是这个因为我有-抄进这些知识和资料这就是我所以有时候-现在我们在讲…
信字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 信心〖 sinceredesire〗 信仰〖 faith;belief;conviction〗 信义〖 goodfaith〗.
郑允浩 - 搜搜百科 ... Zeal（ 热情） Belief（ 信任（belief）） Competitive（ 好胜心强的）.
圣经工具 ... 浸礼, Baptism 相信, Belief 苦毒, Bitterness.

list.abs: 心理学专业词汇英语翻译(A-B) - 生命经纬 ... belief and worship 信仰与崇拜 belief systems 信仰体系 believe 信任.
核心信念 (Core beliefs) 这是个人面对压力时出现的即时想法。
求关于宗教的英语词汇？_百度知道 ... 教规 canon 宗教信仰 religious belief 宗教信仰自由 freedom of religion.
beyond 的用法_百度知道 ... Beyond all question: 无可争辩 Beyond belief: 难以置信 Beyond compare: 无以伦比.
新课标外研社版高... ... establish 奠定基础。 思维拓展 beyond belief 令人难以置信 have belief in 相信，信任全析提示该句中.

jx.jx_en_mean: astonishingly great, good or bad; incredible

lj.lj_ls: 难以置信的丰富（或富饶）。

lj.lj_ly: the driving we have witnessed was beyond belief.
lj.lj_ls: 我们亲眼目睹的驾车场面令人难以置信。

lj.lj_ly: he took the property in the belief that he had consent.
lj.lj_ls: 他拿了那份财产，以为自己得到了同意。

phrase.cizu_name: to the best of my belief

jx.jx_en_mean: in my genuine opinion; as far as I know

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : alteration of Old English  gelēafa; compare with believe

encyclopedia.content: 《belief》是由施人诚作词，左安安作曲，S.H.E.演唱的一首歌曲，收录在专辑《s.h.e奇幻乐园演唱会》中。这是一首流行风格的歌曲，歌曲展现了S.H.E.优美的和声及各自的唱腔特色。

entry.def: Belief is a feeling of certainty that something exists, is true, or is good.

example.ex: One billion people throughout the world are Muslims, united by belief in one god.
example.tran: 全世界有10亿穆斯林，共同的一神信仰将他们团结在一起。

entry.tran: （对宗教或政治的）信仰，观点，看法
entry.def: Your religious or political beliefs are your views on religious or political matters.

example.ex: He refuses to compete on Sundays because of his religious beliefs.
example.tran: 出于宗教信仰，他拒绝在礼拜天进行比赛。

entry.def: If it is your belief that something is the case, it is your strong opinion that it is the case.

example.ex: It is our belief that improvements in health care will lead to a stronger, more prosperous economy.
example.tran: 我们坚信，改善医疗保健会使经济更加繁荣昌盛。

entry.def: You use beyond belief to emphasize that something is true to a very great degree or that it happened to a very great degree.

example.ex: We are devastated, shocked beyond belief...
example.tran: 我们极为震惊，无法相信所发生的一切。

example.ex: Her son's skin improved beyond belief.
example.tran: 她儿子的皮肤得到了难以置信的改善。

entry.tran: 和人们一般的认识相反；和一般看法相反
entry.def: You use contrary to popular belief to introduce a statement that is the opposite to what is thought to be true by most ordinary people.

example.ex: Contrary to popular belief, there is no evidence that what you look like makes much difference to your life.
example.tran: 和人们一般的看法相反，没有证据表明面相对人生有多大影响。

entry.def: If you do one thing in the belief that another thing is true or will happen, you do it because you think, usually wrongly, that it is true or will happen.

example.ex: Civilians had broken into the building, apparently in the belief that it contained food.
example.tran: 平民百姓闯进了大楼，显然他们误以为里面有食物。

means.word_mean: 1. any cognitive content held as true
2. a vague idea in which some confidence is placed;

sentences.sentence: "what are your feelings about the crisis?"
"it strengthened my belief in his sincerity"
"I had a feeling that she was lying"

auth_sentence.content: The fecundity of his musical imagination simply beggars belief.
auth_sentence.res_content: The fecundity of his musical imagination simply beggars belief.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The fecundity of his musical imagination simply beggars belief.

auth_sentence.content: BELIEF in numbers has killed creative thinking in science.
auth_sentence.res_content: BELIEF in numbers has killed creative thinking in science.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: BELIEF in numbers has killed creative thinking in science.

auth_sentence.content: The former is belief, the latter is knowledge.
auth_sentence.res_content: The former is belief, the latter is knowledge.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The former is belief, the latter is knowledge.

Sentence.sentence: That means making some difficult decisions with elderly patients, and going against the misguided belief that when it comes to health care, more is always better.
It's hard to uproot deeply held beliefs about cancer screening with scientific data.
There are many commonly held beliefs about eye glasses and eyesight that are not proven facts.
Eroding religious belief in Europe may partly explain lowered birthrates.
Meanwhile, Europe has fallen prey to a different ideological trap: the belief that European governments would always have infinite resources and could continue borrowing as if there were no tomorrow.
We also need to know whether our thoughts, beliefs and ideas are in line with those of other people.

jushi.english: She is a woman with strong religious beliefs.
jushi.chinese: 她是一个有强烈宗教信仰的妇女。

jushi.english: He was jailed for his religious beliefs.
Contrary to popular belief, he was not responsible for the tragedy.
jushi.chinese: 与大家的看法相反，他对这出悲剧没有责任。
